government.name: Government
government.description: Determines how your civilization is ruled

legal.name: Legal
legal.description: Defines the legal system of your civilization

despotism.name: Despotism
despotism.description: No special effects. Starting government civic.

hereditary_rule.name: Hereditary Rule
hereditary_rule.description: +1 happiness per military unit stationed in a city

representation.name: Representation
representation.description: +3 happiness in 5 largest cities. +3 research per specialist.

universal_suffrage.name: Universal Suffrage
universal_suffrage.description: +1 commerce from towns. Can hurry production with gold.

barbarism.name: Barbarism
barbarism.description: No special effects. Starting legal civic.

vassalage.name: Vassalage
vassalage.description: +2 experience for new military units. Free units from vassals.

nationhood.name: Nationhood
nationhood.description: Can draft 3 units per turn. +2 experience from barracks.

free_speech.name: Free Speech
free_speech.description: +2 commerce from towns. +100% culture in all cities.

tribalism.name: Tribalism
tribalism.description: No special effects. Starting labor civic.

slavery.name: Slavery
slavery.description: Can sacrifice population to hurry production.

caste_system.name: Caste System
caste_system.description: Unlimited artist, scientist, and merchant specialists.

emancipation.name: Emancipation
emancipation.description: +100% cottage growth. Other civs without Emancipation get unhappiness.

decentralization.name: Decentralization
decentralization.description: No special effects. Starting economy civic.

mercantilism.name: Mercantilism
mercantilism.description: No foreign trade routes. +1 free specialist in each city.

free_market.name: Free Market
free_market.description: +1 trade route per city. Trade routes yield +100%.

state_property.name: State Property
state_property.description: No distance maintenance. No corporations. +1 food from workshops/watermills.

environmentalism.name: Environmentalism
environmentalism.description: +6 health per city. +25% corporation maintenance. +2 commerce from forest preserves.

paganism.name: Paganism
paganism.description: No special effects. Starting religion civic.

organized_religion.name: Organized Religion
organized_religion.description: +25% production of buildings that require state religion. Can build missionaries without monastery.

theocracy.name: Theocracy
theocracy.description: +2 experience for units built in cities with state religion. Non-state religions cannot spread.

pacifism.name: Pacifism
pacifism.description: +100% great people birth rate in cities with state religion. +100% military unit maintenance.

free_religion.name: Free Religion
free_religion.description: +1 happiness per religion in city. +1 free specialist per city. Cannot have state religion.
